App.core.description: The Decentralized Open Community in Cannabis ecosystem
auth.LoginForm.password.error: The password has to have at least 6 characters
auth.LoginForm.title: Login
auth.LoginForm.username.error: The username can not be empty
about.bca.p1: Bancannabis.org presents its token BCA the decentralized way to take part in cannabis industry.
about.bca.p2: BCA will allow you to participate in the ecosystem of projects from bancannabis community, such as e-groweed.com, the first decentralized cannabis crowdfunding.
about.bca.p3: It works like as an Ethereum Token, convert you ethers to BCA at rate  of 1 ETH ~= 3.125 BCA.
about.bca.p4: With the token you will have benefits in Bancannabis projects and also you are supporting the develop of the community.
about.bca.p5: At the moment we are exchanging BCA from Ethereum in the pre-sale of e-groweed.com platform.
components.home.p-1: Bancannabis is the digital community of cannabis, we seek the integration of all participants in the productive cycle of cannabis through innovative and decentralized solutions.
components.home.p-2: Bancannabis is creating the most advanced supply chain in cannabis markets through blockchain and IOT integrations. We are providing to any one in the word the opportunity to be part of this growing industry with our first project e-groweed.com
components.home.p-3: Our mission is to create the biggest community of innovation and development in cannabis with social and equity focus.
components.home.ticker-1: We are in the private sale of our Token
